content:
AutoSizeMode Enum

Definition

Specifies how a control will behave when its stem.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize* property is enabled.

In this Article

public enum AutoSizeMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
AutoSizeMode

Remarks

Setting the GrowAndShrink value produces the same behavior that you get for controls with the AutoSize property enabled but which have no

AutoSizeMode property. The MinimumSize and MaximumSize properties are respected, but the current value of the Size property is ignored.

Fields

GrowAndShrink

The control grows or shrinks to fit its contents. The control cannot be resized manually.
GrowOnly

The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its stem.Windows.Forms.Control.Size* property. The form can be resized, but cannot be made so small that any of its contained controls are hidden.
